name: Cleaning, Garment, and Laundry Services
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that operate steam or other types of laundries for
commercial businesses or individuals. On a weekly or monthly basis,
these merchants provide laundered items such as uniforms, gowns,
aprons, table linens, bed linens, and towels. This MCC also includes
diaper services offering home pick-up, cleaning, and delivery.
